communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the DUI arrest of a woman who was found passed out at a red light in Hillsborough County, Florida, on St. Patrick's Day, 03/18/2024.

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: 03/18/2024
Location: Hillsborough County, Florida
Suspect: [suspect's name, if known]
Incident Summary: The woman was found unconscious at the wheel of her car at a red light after a night of drinking. She was unable to identify her location and failed a sobriety test before being arrested for DUI.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who responded to the scene and interacted with the suspect during the investigation and arrest.

I request the following:

Bodycam footage from all responding officers.
Any related dashcam footage if available.
Any additional audio or video footage related to the incident.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of DUI and Reckless Driving Incident Involving Sarah Ramswammy

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the DUI and reckless driving incident involving Sarah Ramswammy on Saturday.

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Location: Smyrna Dunes Park, Volusia County, Florida
Suspect: Sarah Ramswammy, 26
Incident Summary: Ramswammy was arrested after driving her vehicle recklessly on a crowded beach at Smyrna Dunes Park, nearly striking beach-goers before her vehicle ended up in the water. Ramswammy was found to have a blood alcohol concentration of 0.153 and was cited for reckless driving and failure to obey a traffic control device.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who responded to the scene and interacted with Ramswammy during the investigation and arrest.

I request the following:

Bodycam footage from all responding officers.
Any related dashcam footage if available.
Any additional audio or video footage related to the incident.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of DUI Arrest Involving April Moyer

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the DUI arrest of April Moyer on January 1, [2020, not sure about year].

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: January 1, [2020, not sure about year]
Location: Interstate 275, Pinellas County, Florida
Suspect: April Moyer, 22
Incident Summary: Moyer was arrested after she was pulled over by Florida Highway Patrol troopers for speeding at 107 mph in a 65 mph zone. Upon being stopped, Moyer showed signs of impairment, including poor balance, bloodshot eyes, and poor performance on field sobriety tests. Jello shots, beer, and an open container of Tito’s vodka were found in her vehicle.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who responded to the scene and interacted with Moyer during her arrest.

I request the following:

Bodycam footage from all responding officers.
Any related dashcam footage if available.
Any additional audio or video footage related to the arrest.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun
